descriptionHTML:
★★★ Black Hole Watch Face ★★★

Black Hole Watch Face has live space view which has an animated black hole pulling everything inside. You will feel like in space.

Features:
✔ Support both round and square watch
✔ Support all ambient modes

Compatible with all Android Wear watches.
✔ Moto 360
✔ Moto 360 2nd generation
✔ LG G Watch R
✔ LG G Watch
✔ Sony Smartwatch 3
✔ Samsung Gear Live
✔ Asus ZenWatch
✔ Asus ZenWatch 2
✔ LG Watch Urbane
✔ LG Watch Urbane 2nd Edition
✔ Huawei Watch
✔ TAG Heuer Connected
✔ Fossil Q Founder
comments: Easily the best watch face I have. Just needs a little more customisation. The same as my other review really. A beautiful piece of art. Would just love to be able to change the ambient screen though.
I just don't like it , and I would like a refund there isn't an option for refund!
Looks great but needs 12 hour option. EDIT : Quick response from the dev with added 12hour support. Awesome watch face
How do you enable 12 hour mode?

Spacey Very cool and unique watch face. Very minimal design but very easy on the eyes. Just wish it had weather and phone battery level and lose the step counter. Maybe add the option to add those read outs or remove them. Overall nice face! üëç
recentChanges: Fixed ambient mode problem on some devices
